cu.explanation_en: Setting the ASN.1 verbosity to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to an invalid type 'invalid' will cause type mismatch errors and system failure during radio configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為無效類型 'invalid'，會導致類型不匹配錯誤，並在無線電配置期間造成系統故障。
